overview_of_class: Current themes and experimental approaches in cell biology will be discussed through readings of text and original research articles.
name: Advanced Cell Biology
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 315-0-01 Advanced Cell Biology
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have completed the entire sequence of BIOL_SCI 215, 217, 219, 220, 221, 222, and 308 to register for this course.
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Current themes and experimental approaches in cell biology will be discussed through readings of text and original research articles.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Examinations, Discussion reports and In-class worksheets

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Molecular Cell Biology, By Harvey Lodish

Eighth Edition (978-1-4641-8339-3) is preferred, but Seventh Edition (978-1-4292-3413-9) is also adequate.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value:
This core course is required of majors with a Cell Biology and Physiology concentration.

Enrollment in one discussion section is required. Discussions will be held on Wednesday from 4:00-4:50, from 5:00-5:50, and from 6:00-6:50. If enrollment is low, only the 5:00 and 6:00 discussion sections will be offered.

subject: BIOL_SCI
